refactorings_applied: MobileTabBar.tsx: SVG icon components consolidated into reusable Icon component with path definitions
MobileTabBar.tsx: Added memo for Icon component to improve re-render performance
MobileHeader.tsx: SVG icon components consolidated into reusable Icon component with path definitions
MobileHeader.tsx: Added memo for Icon component to improve re-render performance
MobilePromptSheet.tsx: Button style constants consolidated into BUTTON_STYLES object
MobilePromptSheet.tsx: Added memo to YesNoActions and MultipleChoiceActions components
useSwipeGesture.ts: Extracted SwipeDirection type for better type reusability
useSwipeGesture.ts: Added TouchPosition interface for type clarity
useSwipeGesture.ts: Added resetSwipeDirection function to hook return value
useVirtualKeyboard.ts: Added isVisualViewportSupported helper function to reduce code duplication
useVirtualKeyboard.ts: Simplified updateKeyboardState logic with isVisible variable

improvements.code_duplication: Reduced SVG icon attribute duplication in MobileTabBar and MobileHeader by 60+ lines
improvements.naming_consistency: Standardized icon path definitions with ICON_PATHS constant
improvements.type_definitions: Extracted SwipeDirection and TouchPosition types for better reusability
improvements.performance: Added memo to 4 components (Icon in 2 files, YesNoActions, MultipleChoiceActions)
improvements.maintainability: Consolidated button styles into single BUTTON_STYLES object

message: Phase 4 mobile components refactoring completed successfully. Reduced code duplication in icon components, improved type definitions, added performance optimizations with memo, and consolidated style constants.
